quote: I'll be home at five o'clock every night for dinner, no matter what.
why_clipworthy: Demonstrates a practical example of setting boundaries to balance work and family life.
suggested_hook: How setting strict boundaries can transform your work-life balance.

quote: Work less, take care of it more. You don't have to spend all the time you guys do.
why_clipworthy: Challenges the notion that more work equals more success, emphasizing smarter financial management.
suggested_hook: Why working less could actually make you more successful.
